import './App.css'; import profile from "./images/me.png"; import webDevelopment from "./images/webDesign.png"; import codeIcon from "./images/code.png" import toolIcon from "./images/tools.png" import {useEffect,useState} from 'react'; function App() { const action=["design","accept challenges", "develop"] const [actionText, setactionText]= useState(action[0]) let i = 0 const c = async()=>{ setTimeout(()=>{ setactionText(action[i]) i++ if(i < 3){ c(); } if(i===3){ i=0 c() } },2000) } useEffect(()=>{ c() // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps },[]); return (

Front End Developer and Mentor

Person who loves to {actionText}

Hey! How's it going?!

My name is Alexander Guevara, and I am an aspiring web/mobile developer. Born and raised in NYC, I have experienced the art, food, and cultural diversity it has to show. Always entering with an open-mind, I enjoy listening to the stories/adventures of people's lives as each and every person has a unique story to tell. I participate in projects ranging from developing data structures to designing websites and mobile apps. For more info, just take a look at my Resume or my other social links below. You can also email me at alexgue26@hotmail.com.

Programming Languages

  • Reactjs
  • React Native
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Sass
  • Git
  • Node.js

Dev Tools

  • Github
  • Visual Code Studio
  • Bootstrap
  • Heroku
  • BitBucket
  • Firebase
  • Google Cloud
); } export default App;
